Class ControllerStateManager

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class ControllerStateManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the creation of Controller's States
    Author:
    Lorenzo Minto

    • Constructor Detail

      • ControllerStateManager

        public ControllerStateManager(Controller controller)
        Constructor for the Controller State Manager. Each controller instance has a specific controller state manager, so it is required as a param the controller instance that will then receiveFromServer the controller states instances when asking for them
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller to which are added the states

    • Method Detail

      • getNextState

        public ControllerState getNextState(ControllerState prevState)
        Based on the active toolCard, decides what is the new state that the connected controller should take
        Parameters:
        prevState - the previous controller state
        Returns:
        the next controller state based on the active toolCard
